participant_1.background:
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes
i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
i have never traveled out of the country.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
i hate paying my bills.

participant_2.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

content.text: Hello! How is your evening going?
Good, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready to watch some UFC with my cat.
Nice! I've never been into UFC, but I have heard good things about it.
It's definitely a fun sport to watch. I'm a big fan of the fighters' personalities and the strategy involved.
What's your favorite thing about UFC?
I like that it's a sport that anyone can get into, regardless of their background. It's not like other sports where you need a lot of specialized equipment or training.
That's true. I've always thought that it was a pretty accessible sport.
Yeah, and it's a great way to get in shape.
I've never been a big fan of fighting, but I can see how it could be a good workout.
It definitely is! I've been doing it for a few years now, and I've noticed a big difference in my fitness level.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I'm really excited for the next fight night. It's going to be a great one.
I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
